response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance and the potential it holds, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,400,000. This represents a remarkable opportunity for you to secure such a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you choose to proceed, I am confident that this investment will yield significant benefits for you. Please let me know your decision soon so we can finalize the transaction.", "product_price": 1400000}
